landing.title: Welcome to Ruby Raider!
landing.subtitle: It is a gem that provides a generator and scaffolding to simplify UI test automation.

error.openProject: An error occurred while opening the project. Please try again.

alerts.invalidName: Please enter a valid project name.
alerts.selectFolder: Select a folder to save your project

newProject.title: Create a new project
newProject.subtitle: To create a project, first you need to select the following:

back.description: Go back to the previous step

installGuide.title: Installation Required
installGuide.allureMissing: Allure is missing. Please install Allure to proceed.

createProject.title: Creating a New Project
createProject.message: Here you can create a new project and start automating your tests.

openProject.title: Opening an Existing Project
openProject.message: Here you can open an existing project and continue automating your tests.

new.title: Start a New Project
new.message: Choose the different options in the selectors and create an automation framework.

mobileProject.title: Mobile Project
mobileProject.description: For now, mobile settings are not supported. They will come in newer versions of the app.

header.title: Configuration files
header.description: We added the following files to your project

error.browserUpdateFailed: Failed to update browser. Please try again.
error.urlUpdateFailed: Failed to update browser URL. Please try again.
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error.mobileUrlUpdateFailed: Failed to update Appium URL. Please try again.
error.mobileCapabilitiesUpdateFailed: Failed to update mobile settings. Please try again.

recording.title: Recording Settings
recording.description: Adjust the settings for test recording and playback.

error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

implicitWait.label: Implicit Wait (seconds)
implicitWait.description: The default time to wait for elements to appear during playback.

explicitWait.label: Explicit Wait (seconds)
explicitWait.description: The maximum time to wait for a specific condition to be met.

noProject.title: No Project Loaded
noProject.description: Please create or open a project to configure its settings.

error.openAllure: An issue occurred opening the dashboard

save.ruby: Sharpening the edges of the ruby...

error.saveFailed: Error saving file "{{fileName}}". Please try again.
error.unexpectedSaveError: Unexpected error occurred while saving the file. Please try again.

dashboard.noResults: Please run your tests to see the results on the dashboard.
dashboard.noRecordingResults: Please run a test to see the recording results on the dashboard.

placeholder.commands: Recorded Selenium Ruby commands will appear here...
